eventParts.text: Those poor birds are being harassed by those vultures! Let’s get them!
Oh feathers, that’s a lot of them! Let’s get out of here!
Oh no, you guys are merchant birds! Are you okay?
Those vultures stole some of our supplies. We were going to sell them at Cloudfield… I don’t know if we have enough now.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Rebecca, maybe you can help them? You know about trading, right?
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Of course! Here, let me help you count that, I’m sure we can figure out a way to make this work out!

Rebecca gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: We’ll help you guys gather up your supplies again! Rebecca, do you mind helping out here?
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Oh! Uhm, yeah, sure!

Rebecca gains +2 caution!
